ht_quote: There is no alternate way to success other than education
description: A school that provides quality education to underprivileged children.
quote: Education is the key to success in life.

ht_quote: Be a wonderful role model because you will be the window through which many children will see their future
description: Founded in 1995, it has been providing free education for the community.

ht_quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
description: Dedicated to fostering education and developing future leaders.
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

ht_quote: Education is the best weapon you can use to change the world
description: Empowering children to overcome obstacles and pursue their dreams.
quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

ht_quote: The pen is mightier than the sword
description: Committed to bringing change in society through education.
quote: In the classroom, the teacher is the architect of the future.

ht_quote: A teacher's influence never stops, it goes on till the day you die
description: Established in 1992 in Rupganj, Bangladesh. It now hosts 24 students taught by 2 teachers.
quote: A teacher's influence never stops, it goes on till the day you die.

ht_quote: A good education can change anyone. A good teacher can change everything.
description: Dedicated to shaping the future of its students through quality teaching.
quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
